FuncDef: The display segment-routing adjacency mpls forwarding command displays the segment routing adjacency label forwarding table.
Examples: Segment Routing Adjacency MPLS Forwarding Information
Label      Interface     NextHop       Type       MPLSMtu   Mtu
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check the segment routing adjacency label forwarding table, run the display segment-routing adjacency mpls forwarding command. There is a one-to-one mapping between this table and the one delivered to the FES.
No entry will be displayed in the segment routing label forwarding table after the undo segment-routing command is run.
